| HistoryText             = 
===Origin===
With an increasing student body, [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] & [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] reorganized the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]]'s educational and training program into a squad system.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1}} The Chevaliers Squad was advised by [[Remy LeBeau (Earth-616)|Gambit]].{{r|X-Men Vol 2 #171}}{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}

===Foxx in the Attic===
When Foxx mysteriously arrived at the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]], she was placed in Gambit’s Chevaliers Squad and immediately began causing chaos. She spread rumors and flirted with several individuals including [[Remy LeBeau (Earth-616)|Gambit]] and [[Roxanne Washington (Earth-616)|Bling!]]. Foxx was soon revealed to be Mystique in disguise trying to infiltrate the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]].{{r|X-Men Vol 2 #171|#174}}

===Members===
* [[Roxanne Washington (Earth-616)|Bling!]] - Roxy Washington was the field leader and possesses crystal skin. Retained her powers and remained with the X-Men.
* [[Nick Shelley (Earth-616)|Flubber]] - Nick Shelley had a rubbery body. Depowered, and current whereabouts/status unknown.
* [[Sidney Green (Earth-616)|Onyxx]] - Sidney Green had a granite body and possessed superhuman strength. Retained his powers, but was later killed by [[Kevin Ford (Earth-616)|Wither]] on [[Utopia (X-Men Base)|Utopia]] during [[Necrosha]].{{r|X-Force Vol 3 #23}}
* [[Carl Aalston (Earth-616)|Rain Boy]] - Carl Aalston had a living liquid form. Depowered, and current whereabouts/status unknown.
* [[Raven Darkholme (Earth-616)|Foxx]] - Revealed to be Mystique attempting to infiltrate the X-Men.

===M-Day===
After [[Decimation|M-Day]] only 27 of 182 enrolled Xavier's students retained their powers. The Chevaliers were disbanded along with all the other [[X-Men Training Squads]]. Bling! and Onyxx were the only members to retain their powers, and stayed at the Xavier Institute.

| Trivia                  = 
* All of the student members of the Chevaliers Squad had physical mutations.
* Before the Chevaliers Squad's name was revealed in {{cl|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}, many fans referred to them as '''Guilded Squad''' possibly in reference to Gambit's time with the [[Thieves Guild (Earth-616)|Thieves Guild]].
* "'''Chevalier'''" is the french translation for '''Knight''', French being one of the adviser [[Remy LeBeau (Earth-616)|Gambit]]'s native languages.
